posts.post_content: Great looking card…graded authentic due to strange cut along the left border.  I had the discussion with SGC 15 years ago when I had it graded that it looked like a botched factory cut but they still wouldn’t give it a number.  The image is superb and the reverse printing is flawless.  $1125 net to me.  PayPal or check.  First PM that says “I’ll take it” gets the card.
